Title: Walk with Me
Writer: Frank Darabont (developed by), Robert Kirkman (series of graphic novels), Tony Moore (series of graphic novels), Charlie Adlard (series of graphic novels), Evan T. Reilly
Actors: Andrew Lincoln, Sarah Wayne Callies, Laurie Holden, Norman Reedus
Plot: Andrea and Michonne are brought to a walled community run by a man called The Governor.
